channel.title: Seeking out experienced developers for my team
channel.description:
[b]About[/b]: We currently have a team of three people: One who deals with advertisement/marketing, one who deals with website/server integration, and a sever developer. We're currently looking for one more developer, preferably one who has experience running servers and know what players want to [b]see[/b] in one. Also being excellent at clients would be nice, but isn't needed.
We have the financial details secured and we can invest as much money as we need to into the server to get it to succeed. We want to create a server that will cater to players, and will create an interactive, enjoyable, long-lasting community. If you're looking for the same please reply to this thread or message me. Thanks.
